p: The TG/DTG/DTA thermo-analytical curves were recorded on an STA 409C Luxx system, produced by Netzsch-Germany. The experiments were conducted on 30-300ºC temperature range, at β = 10 K ·min −1 heating rates, using platinum crucibles in dynamic air (100 mL.min −1, 20% O 2) or a nitrogen atmosphere (100 mL·min −1, 99.99% N 2). The sample mass was ~ 10 mg. The curves were processed using the Netzsch Proteus software.
